mng: variant of 閑|闲, idle, unoccupied, leisure, free time
variant of 閑|闲, idle, unoccupied, leisure, free time

exm.mng: leisure, relaxation, not working, idle, to enjoy leisure, to lie fallow
to snatch a moment of leisure, to take a break from work
to leave sth forgotten, to set aside, lying idle
to meddle, to be a "nosy Parker", to be too inquisitive about other people's business
to hang around, to hang out
